timeline.bodyText: Since this class interacts with the remote data store, and not Android SDK specifically, perhaps it belongs in ..persistence.remote? Also, I'd name it something Firestore specific. Later we'll need to extract a generic interface so that we have an internal API to switch providers if necessary.
